Module paths
Package ntnu.idatt2001.ejhaslerjorgfi.util

Class GuiApplication

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt2001.ejhaslerjorgfi.util.GuiApplication
public final class GuiApplication extends Object

GuiApplication

This class is an implementation of the creational design pattern known as Singleton. Upon application launch, there is only a single instance of this class created.

The Singleton acts as a medium for the different components in the GUI application, holding instances for all controller classes. When a module needs access to a controller, it can access it by calling its corresponding accessor-method which lies within this class.

Since:
05.03.2023
Version:
16.05.2023
Author:
Group 24

      public static void setApplicationStage(javafx.stage.Stage appStage)

      Parameters:
      stage - the stage object of the application.
